summary: This document is an email chain from September 2020, forwarded within the FBI, in which an individual identifies themselves as a longtime victim of Jeffrey Epstein and requests to speak with a victim specialist regarding their rights to services or referrals.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator by an individual who identifies as a longtime victim seeking victim services.

events.title: Victim Request for Services
events.description: An individual emails VictimServices, identifying as a longtime victim of Jeffrey Epstein and requesting to speak with a victim specialist regarding rights to services or referrals.

keyFacts: An individual identifies themselves as a 'longtime Jeffrey Epstein victim' in a September 2020 email.
The victim is seeking assistance from a victim specialist regarding their rights to services or referrals.
The email was forwarded within the FBI's New York office, indicating ongoing victim outreach or case management related to Epstein.
The communication highlights that victims were still coming forward and seeking support over a year after Epstein's death.
